snippet: "The President of Vice," an e-book that will be released Friday at the Kindle Singles store of Amazon.com, offers a ponytail-wearing, Trans Am-washing version of the vice president familiar to readers of The Onion.
abstract: "The President of Vice," an e-book that will be released Friday at the Kindle Singles store of Amazon.com, offers a ponytail-wearing, Trans Am-washing version of the vice president familiar to readers of The Onion.

headline.main: Biden Getting an Autobiography From The Onion (Whether He Wants It or Not)
headline.print_headline: A Biden ‘Autobiography’ Coming From The Onion
